content: marigold this flower was originally designed for a gnome yarn and hook yarn size ~ 3 various type of yarns hook size 2 5 mm stichtes chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet tbb single_crochet - tunisian back bar single_crochet bl + stitch - back loop stich fl + stitch - front loop stich flower the basic idea is to have a row of 6 stitches 1 row of petals will be crocheted on the front loops then on the back loops next row of 6 stitches or last row of petals 1 magic_ring of 6 single_crochet front loop → petal row 2 back loop → for next base row 2 1 chain 1 blss 1 flss to next st * 2 1 chain 1 blss 1 flss 1 chain 1 blss 1 flss to next stitch * 2 petal count in stitches 8 petals 1 1 2 1 1 2 3 6 blsc front loop → petal row 4 back loop → for next base row 4 1 flss 4 chain 1 blsc to 2nd chain from hook 1 chain 1 flss 1 slip_stitch * 2 * 6 2 petal in every st 12 petals 5 6 blsc front loop → petal row 6 back loop → petal row 7 6 1 flss 5ch 2 tbbsc 1 tbbss 1 chain 1 tbbsc t tbbss 1 chain 4 blss *2 *6 7 1 blss 6ch 3 tbbsc 1 tbbss 1 chain 2 tbbsc t tbbss 1 chain 5 blss *2 *6 leaf every single_crochet after a chain means go back to 2nd chain from hook a row of simple 3 single_crochet or slip_stitch is the main part of the leaf i separated the middle and side parts 3 single_crochet 4 chain 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1sc 3 single_crochet 5 chain 1 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 1sc 3 single_crochet 6 chain 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1sc 3 single_crochet 7 chain 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1sc 3 slip_stitch 6 chain 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1sc 3 slip_stitch 5 chain 1 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 1sc 3 slip_stitch 4 chain 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1sc 3 slip_stitch
